:::HeraldAngel/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Sky Lynx/Sharpedge:::

Herald: I merely wish to discuss how you got the matrix and what you will do 
with its power.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
::Ratchet, Sideswipe, and Sky Lynx arrive at the CF and walk to the 
conference room.  They see Torca talking to a young bot::
Sideswipe: Yo Torca, whose the kid?
Torca: I introduce you to, Orion, son of Bluestreak and Andromeda!
::Ratchet smiles wide.  he knew this bot was familiar::
Orion: Your Ratchet, right?  My dad's best friend?
Ratchet: Thats me!
Orion: Great to finally meet you all!  So, any idea what this meeting is 
about?
Sky Lynx: No clue.
::Torca sees Klant come in::
Torca: hey Klant!  No your not late.  The meeting hasnt even started yet!
::They continue to wait for the meeting to start::
OOC: Ya see Zardus? Not EVERYONE ignored the meeting.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
Sharpedge: Thank you Deemos.
::Sharpedge had once been a Maximal when he landed on the planet, but since 
the Chosen Ones were calling themselves Maximals, Sharpedge joined them and 
became more evil by the day.  he had already killed 2 of deemos' enemies, 
Testifier and Granite, and by now was blindly loyal to Deemos::

--part1_48.e228af4.2756645a_boundary
